abstract: Maria Sharapova defeats Ana Ivanovic to win women's Brisbane International tennis tournament; other tennis matches and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Sharapova claimed her 34th career title with a victory at the Brisbane International in Australia, hours after Roger Federer moved within one win of 1,000 for his career.
snippet: Sharapova claimed her 34th career title with a victory at the Brisbane International in Australia, hours after Roger Federer moved within one win of 1,000 for his career.

headline.main: Maria Sharapova Beats Ana Ivanovic for Title in Brisbane
headline.print_headline: Sharapova Beats Ivanovic for Title in Brisbane
